summary.Title: Massage therapist 4-5 days per week
summary.Presentation:
Massage Therapist (4-5 Days per Week)
Are you a passionate and qualified massage therapist looking for an exciting role in the heart of Copenhagen? Ezanza Massage is growing

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Massage Therapist (4-5 Days per Week)

Are you a passionate and qualified massage therapist looking for an exciting role in the heart of Copenhagen? Ezanza Massage is growing, and we’d love to welcome you to our team, working 4-5 fixed days per week by agreement, including weekdays and weekends.

About the Position

  • Work Schedule: 4-5 days per week, from 11:00 AM to 6:00 PM, including both weekdays and weekends.
  • Locations: Central Copenhagen, near Nørreport and Kongens Nytorv.
  • Role: Provide a variety of massage treatments at both locations, following our unified concept.

What We’re Looking For

  • Qualifications: Certification in massage therapy (physiotherapy is a plus).
  • Personality: Friendly, active, independent, and a great team player who loves creating excellent client experiences.
  • Language Skills: Fluent in English (spoken and written); Danish is a plus.
  • Lifestyle: Non-smoker.

What We Offer

  • Work Environment: A diverse, welcoming workplace that values respect and collaboration. You’ll work with skilled colleagues from around the world.
  • Team Structure: Collaborate daily with a hostess and 3-5 other therapists.
  • Clientele: A large and loyal client base ensures varied daily treatments, from 30 to 120 minutes.
  • Training: Comprehensive training in our unique massage techniques, including deep tissue, wellness, and specialized headache and neck massages. Dedicated trainers will support you during onboarding and beyond.

Learn More About Us

Visit www.ezanza.dk to explore more about Ezanza and what we offer.

How to Apply

Send your application, photo, and CV to Mette at job@ezanza.dk.
We’re looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,
Mette Stendell Jensen
Owner, Ezanza Massage
